item.title: SoS Notebook: a multi-language notebook for Jupyter
item.description: I started to use IPython, and then Jupyter more than ten years ago but despite of all the nice features, there were always something missing, something that prevented me from using it as my main working environment. Notably, Jupyter lacks Line by line execution of scripts: The basic execution units of Jupyter are cells so there is no way for you to execute, tweak, and re-execute pieces of the code for debugging purposes Jupyter Issue 1094.
